testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given Step 1 user go to register page.......................................passed And Step 2 user select gender type..........................................passed And Step 3 user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"........passed And Step 4 user enter date of birth.........................................passed And Step 5 user enter email "test@example.com" field........................passed And Step 6 user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd".................passed When Step 7 user clicks on register button..................................passed Then Step 8 success message is displayed....................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given Step 1 user go to login page..........................................passed And Step 2 user login with "valid" "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"........passed When Step 3 user press on login button......................................passed Then Step 4 user login to the system successfully...........................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could not login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given Step 1 user go to login page..........................................passed And Step 2 user login with "invalid" "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".....passed When Step 3 user press on login button......................................passed Then Step 4 user could not login to the system..............................passed

testcase.classname: F03_currencies | customer can choose currency type that he would like to deal with
testcase.name: customer can deal with Euro
testcase.system-out: When Step 1 user select Euro currency from the dropdown list on the top left of home page.passed Then Step 2 Euro Symbol € is shown on the 4 products displayed in Home page.passed

testcase.classname: F07_followUs | users could open followUs links
testcase.name: user opens rss link

failure.message: The following asserts failed: expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/new-online-store-is-open] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/news/rss/1]

testcase.failure:
When user opens rss link....................................................passed Then rss page is opened in new tab..........................................failed
StackTrace: java.lang.AssertionError: The following asserts failed: expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/new-online-store-is-open] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/news/rss/1] at org.testng.asserts.SoftAssert.assertAll(SoftAssert.java:47) at org.testng.asserts.SoftAssert.assertAll(SoftAssert.java:31) at org.examples.stepDefs.D07_followUsStepDef.rss_link(D07_followUsStepDef.java:88) at ✽.rss page is opened in new tab(file:///C:/Users/Osos/IdeaProjects/E-Commerce/src/main/resources/features/F07_followUs.feature:5)
